title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 349.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 349.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term
full-time officer or employeemeans any person whose salary is paid directly by
the State: (1)
whose regular work schedule is
20 hours a week or more; or
(2)
who
is paid on an annual salary basis, whose salary rate is $2,000 per year or
more. (b) The term
public pension plan means any retirement system or pension plan supported by
funds of the State or of any municipality or civil division of the

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
349.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
